content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This contribution is fun and very well suited for a game of clash of code (fastest - shortest)

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice and simple

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It's nice and simple for quick relaxing match or for beginners.

1. The constraint and the test cases are not consistent. The constraint says the number of integers in the inputs cannot be 2, but there are cases where it is.
2. Please format all the variables in the statement and the input section based on the guidelines here:
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement#guidelines
3. Please specify in the statement how equal numbers are treated.

Hi, congrats on your first contribution. Currently your test cases are either all different values or all same value. I think you should add another mixed case where there are two equal small elements to make this case clearer. I also think this challenge is fairly simple, I would just sort the array and return the second element.
Edit: I saw you have this example in the long test. Maybe make another smaller similar test to make it more understandable.

This is my first contribution, please share any feedback you have. 
Is the description clear? 
Are the game modes selected appropriate?

Hello, thank you for your comment. 
I have added a test case for the scenario you suggested. 

Based on my experience, simple tasks have been fun to do in the "shortest" mode. It becomes easier to focus on writing small code when the task is easy to achieve. I am less sure about the "fastest" mode.

Hello, thank you for your comment, and the useful link. 
I have updated my description with your suggestions. 
Please let me know if the result is more clear, and if there is anything else that I can improve.
